* Event: This month's Madison Ubuntu Hour was February 18. This event is on the third Saturday of each month, and is hosted by <nowiki>[[http://madisonlinux.org/|Madison LUG]]</nowiki>. The next Madison Ubuntu Hour will be March 16.
